name: langfeng.github.io
body:
### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I did my undergraduate work in Corporate Finance at Central University of Finance & Economics. The fields I am very interested are asset allocation and market-timing strategies.

### My Projects
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### My Python Notebook
* [Python Basics](https://github.com/langfengumich/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [Project Euler](https://github.com/langfengumich/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-secret-notebook-empty.ipynb)

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Basics notebook](https://github.com/langfengumich/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [Secret notebook](https://github.com/pbenson/qfrm-bootcamp/blob/gh-pages/python-templates/python-secret-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [Black Scholes notebook](https://github.com/langfengumich/qfrm-python/blob/master/finance/python-black-scholes-merton.ipynb)
* [Interview NoteBook](https://github.com/langfengumich/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-interview-notebook-empty.ipynb)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
